h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Waterward Orb Location
content: The Waterward Orb can be found in Mount Huaguo upon defeating Jiao-Loong of Waves.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Waterward_Orb.md', within the main section titled 'Waterward Orb', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Waterward Orb Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Waterward Orb can be found in Mount Huaguo upon defeating Jiao-Loong of Waves.
